mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "member.id", a.venue_id AS "reserveVenue.id", v.name AS "reserveVenue.name", a.cons_mobile AS "consMobile", a.user_name AS "userName", a.cons_type AS "consType", a.reserve_type AS "reserveType", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.should_price AS "shouldPrice", a.cons_price AS "consPrice", a.discount_price AS "discountPrice", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.cons_date AS "consDate", a.checkout_id AS "checkOutUser.id", a.by_pc AS "byPC", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN reserve_venue as v ON v.id = a.venue_id LEFT JOIN reserve_user as u ON u.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
select v.name as "venue.name", f.id as "field.id", f.name as "field.name", sum(i.period_num) as "periodNum" from reserve_venue_cons as a INNER JOIN reserve_venue_cons_item as i on (a.id = i.cons_data_id and i.del_flag='0') INNER JOIN reserve_venue as v ON (a.venue_id = v.id and v.del_flag='0') INNER JOIN reserve_field as f on (f.id = i.field_id) where a.del_flag = '0' and a.reserve_type = '4'
and (Date(a.cons_date) BETWEEN DATE (#{startDate}) AND DATE(#{endDate}))
and a.venue_id = #{venue.id}
${sqlMap.dsf} GROUP BY i.field_id

SELECT SUM(transaction_volume) as transactionVolume,MONTH(a.update_date) as month,v.name as venueName,v.id as venueId FROM reserve_card_statements a LEFT JOIN reserve_venue v on v.id=a.venue_id WHERE transaction_type = '8' or transaction_type = '9' or transaction_type = '3' or transaction_type = '6' ${sqlMap.dsf} group by MONTH(a.update_date),venue_id
